mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, username, password, input_time, tel, email, state, admin, dep_id) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{inputTime}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{state}, #{admin}, #{department.id})
mapper.update: update employee set username = #{username}, input_time = #{inputTime}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, state = #{state}, admin = #{admin}, dep_id = #{department.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, username, input_time, tel, email, state, admin, dep_id from employee where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

where.if: e.username like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or e.tel like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or e.email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')

mapper.select: select e.id, e.username, e.input_time, e.tel, e.email, e.state, e.admin, e.dep_id, d.id as d_id, d.name as d_name from employee as e left join department d on e.dep_id = d.id
